name: RED MOON RONIN
description: "Red moon ronin"(RED MOON SAMURAI) is a retro side-scrolling platform game created by FEEMSOFT founder Malik Bruno and charles cullum .Its a story about a samurai cyborg named Roshi from a post apocalyptic japan fighting for the freedom of his people. against the forces of a warlock named Ryu kahn and his underworld army of demons .Roshi uses his cybernetic eye also known as the "Red moon" to see between worlds and his "katana blaster " to cut down enemies. MUSIC BY Philip Chance
